name: CrocHead
description:
The Croc-Head is out of control!

This game is based on a famous Arcade Game from the 80's, But this time, there is a twist - Instead of controlling the player, You command the enemies!

You need to prevent the enemies from reaching the player, and the player's goal is to collect as many points as possible.

This Game was made for the "GMTK Game Jam 2020."

How to Play:

===============================================================

- The Player Moves randomly across the map.

- Use the 1-2-3-4 Keys to select the enemy'd like to command, and click on a tile to send the enemy to that tile.

- Your goal is to get the Croc-Head to collect all the eggs.

- If the Croc-Head collects a Golden Egg, All active enemies will be vulnerable for a limited amount of time. During that time, the player can eat them to get a juicy point boost, so try to lead vulnerable enemies towards the player.

That's it, Hope you enjoy the game!
